ValidationRule.description: Deals cannot be created with close date set to past
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND($Profile.Name != 'Data Loader Profile', OR(AND(ISCHANGED(Close_Date__c),Close_Date__c < TODAY()), AND(ISNEW(),Close_Date__c < TODAY())))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Close date cannot be set to past. It must be either today or future.
